title: Legendary Blacksmith Online - Novel Updates
tags: Blacksmith   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Virtual Reality
author: Zi Xi Shi Yan   子系市隐
description:
Third-rate university student Zhu Zixi is enticed by his roommates into playing , with no intention to become a blacksmith, he begins his journey towards becoming a legendary craftsman!

What is the true meaning of an artifact?

How does it turn into a legend?

My bunch of brothers are also waiting for equipment!>
